question.Q: The Law of the People’s Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety is designed to maintain road traffic order, ____ , and increase the efficiency of traffic flow.
question.A: Ensure vehicles can run at high speed
question.C: Protect the legitimate rights and interests of the citizens

question.Q: A motorized vehicle can run on the road only after it has been registered with the _________________.
question.A: Institution in charge of road transport administration
question.B: Traffic control department of the public security organ
question.C: Department in charge of industrial and commercial administration

question.Q: An unregistered motorized vehicle should _________________ if it has to run on the road temporarily.
question.B: Register with the public security organ
question.C: Directly go and run on the road
question.D: Paste a certificate of inspection on the window

question.Q: When applying for motorized vehicle registration, the certificate or document the vehicle owner does not have to present is the ___________________.
question.B: ID card and the certificate of origin of the motorized vehicle
question.C: Certificate of ex-factory inspection or the certificate of import for the motorized vehicle
question.D: Certificate of vehicle purchase tax payment or exemption

question.Q: If _______, a motorized vehicle does not need the relevant registration.
question.B: It is used as a mortgage

question.Q: A motorized vehicle reaching the scrapping standard _________ .
question.A: Is permitted to temporarily run on the road
question.B: Is not allowed to run on the road
question.C: May run on the road after being repaired
question.D: May run on the road after the administrative fee is paid

question.Q: The institution allowed to confiscate and detain motorized vehicle driving licenses is the _____________.
question.A: Department in charge of road transport administration
question.B: Traffic control department of the public security organ
question.C: Department in charge of industrial and commercial administration

question.Q: When driving a motorized vehicle on the road, the driver _____________.
question.A: May not bring the driving license with him
question.B: May not bring the vehicle license with him
question.C: Must bring the driving license, the vehicle license and the label of mandatory insurance with him
question.D: Should bring the certificate of ex-factory inspection or the certificate of import with him

question.Q: Before driving a motorized vehicle on the road, the driver should carefully check the __________ of the vehicle.
The motorized vehicle driver __________________.
question.A: May drive at will when there is no traffic signal
question.B: Should drive according to the traffic rules and in a safe and courteous manner
question.C: May drive at will when there is no traffic police
question.D: May drive according to his habit

question.Q: The driver may drive a motorized vehicle __________________.
question.B: When he suffers from a disease that impedes safe driving

question.Q: The traffic control department of the public security organ detains the driving license of a motorized vehicle and ______________ if the driver’s accumulated penalty points reach the stipulated limit.
question.A: Educated him on the law and regulations on road traffic safety

question.Q: ___________ of the following are not road traffic signals.
___________ of the following are not road traffic signals.
The illustrated hand signal of the traffic police indicates that the vehicles should _______________.
The illustrated hand signal of the traffic police indicates that the vehicles should _______________.
The illustrated hand signal of the traffic police indicates that the vehicle violating the traffic rules should __________________.
When driving a motorized vehicle, the driver must obey the principle of _______.
On the road not divided into the lane for motorized vehicles, the lane for non-motorized vehicles and the sidewalk, the motorized vehicles should run ___________.
question.A: On both sides of the road
question.B: In the middle of the road

question.Q: When there is a traffic police on the spot to direct traffic, the motorized vehicle should run according to_____.
When running on the road having no traffic signs or markings, the motorized vehicle should _____________.
question.C: Stop and look around before going ahead
question.D: Pass if it is safe to do so and the traffic is not obstructed

question.Q: When running on the road having maximum speed limit signs, the motorized vehicle _______________.
question.A: Is not allowed to exceed the marked maximum speed
question.B: Is allowed to exceed the marked maximum speed by 10%
question.C: May run faster than the designed maximum speed of the vehicle
question.D: Should run at the stipulated maximum speed

question.Q: When running in the road section having no speed limit signs, the motorized vehicle _____________.
question.A: Should run at the designed maximum speed of the vehicle
question.B: Is not subject to speed limit
question.C: Should run at a safe speed

question.Q: When running at night or going through a dangerous road section, the motorized vehicle should ________.
question.A: Run at the designed maximum speed
question.D: Run faster than the stipulated maximum speed

question.Q: When encountering sand, hail, rain, snow, fog, ice and other weather conditions, the vehicle should run ______.
question.B: Faster than the stipulated maximum speed

question.Q: When going through an intersection that has no traffic lights, traffic signs, traffic markings or traffic police, the motorized vehicle should ______________.
question.B: Reduce speed and go through slowly

question.Q: When running through a road section or intersection where lanes are reduced, the motorized vehicle should ___________________.
question.A: Move to another lane and overtake
question.D: Jump to another lane and pass

question.Q: when encountering slow-moving vehicles at an intersection that has no traffic signals, the motorized vehicle should ___________________.
question.A: Move to the Right lane and overtake

question.Q: when going through a railway crossing with traffic signals, the motorized vehicle should ______________.
question.C: Speed up as fast as possible
question.D: Pass according to the traffic signals

question.Q: when going through a railway crossing with managerial personnel, the motorized vehicle should _______.
question.B: Obey the command of the managerial personnel
question.C: Speed up as fast as possible

question.Q: when going safely through a railway crossing without traffic signals, the motorized vehicle should _______.
question.B: Slow down or stop and look
question.C: Speed up and pass as fast as possible
question.D: Closely follow the vehicle in front

question.Q: when going through a railway crossing without managerial personnel, the motorized vehicle should _______.
question.B: Closely follow the vehicle in front
question.C: Speed up and pass as fast as possible
question.D: Slow down or stop and look

question.Q: when pedestrians are crossing a crosswalk, the motorized vehicle should _________.
question.D: Speed up in advance and pass

question.Q: when running on a road without traffic signals and encountering pedestrians crossing the road, the motorized vehicle should __________________.
question.A: Honk to urge the pedestrians to go faster
question.C: Reduce speed or stop and yield

question.Q: when a motorized vehicle has a problem on the road and needs to stop and solve it, the driver should immediately open the hazard warning flash lights and _______________.
question.A: Stop on the spot so as to avoid mechanical breakdown
question.B: Move the vehicle to a place where it does not obstruct the traffic
question.C: Stop the vehicle immediately and place a warning sign in front of it
question.D: Stop the vehicle and immediately report to the police

question.Q: When a motorized vehicle breaks down on the road and cannot be moved, the driver should first turn on the hazard warning flash lights and _________________.
question.B: Seek help from the passing vehicles
question.C: Place a warning sign in the coming direction

question.Q: When a motorized vehicle breaks down on the road and cannot be moved, the driver should first of all ______.
question.B: Seek help from the passing vehicles
question.D: Keep the hazard warning flash lights on

question.Q: When the police car, fire engine, ambulance and wrecker are executing an emergency task, other vehicle __.
question.A: May speed up and join them

question.Q: When the police car, fire engine, ambulance and wrecker are not executing an emergency task, they _______.
question.A: Do not have the privileged passing right of way
question.B: Have the privileged passing right of way
question.C: Other vehicles and pedestrians should yield

question.Q: when the road maintenance vehicle and the engineering vehicle are on duty, the passing vehicles and people__.
question.D: Should stick to their respective lanes

question.Q: A Wrong parking by a motorized vehicle means _______________.
question.A: Should park in the designated place
question.C: Stopping temporarily on the road but not obstructing the passing of other vehicles and pedestrians
question.D: Parking in the lane for non-motorized vehicles

question.Q: The maximum speed indicated by an expressway speed limit sign should be no more than _____________.
When a motorized vehicle breaks down on an expressway, the warning sign should be placed ____________ away in the coming direction.

When causing a road accident involving human casualties, the driver should ____________, and report to the traffic police on duty or the traffic control department of the public security organ as soon as possible.
question.B: Move the vehicle to a safe place rapidly
question.C: Leave the scene and discuss compensation on his own

question.Q: ing a road accident involving no human casualties, the parties to the accident should __________________ if they have no dispute over the fact and cause.
question.A: Park the vehicles in the original place, preserve the scene and wait for the traffic police to handle
question.B: Immediately leave the scene and discuss compensation on their own
question.D: Preserve the scene and request the insurance company to assess the damage

question.Q: When causing a road accident involving only slight property damage and the basic fact is clear, the parties to the accident ___________________.
question.B: Should report to the police immediately
question.C: Should first leave the scene and then discuss how to solve the problem
question.D: Should park the vehicles in the original place and discuss compensation

question.Q: A motorized vehicle driver who has violated the provisions on road traffic of the law and regulations on road traffic safety is subject to a warning or ______________.
A motorized vehicle driver who drives after drinking alcohol is subject to the temporary detention of the driving license for __________and also a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 500 Yuan.

A motorized vehicle driver who drives after getting drunk should be restrained by the traffic control department of the public security organ till he sobers up. In addition, the driver is subject to a detention for ________, a temporary detention of his driving license for 3~6 months and a fine of 500 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver violates the provisions on the parking and temporary stopping of motorized vehicles of the law and regulations on road traffic safety, the driver is subject to a fine of __________ if he is not present at the scene and his vehicle obstructs the flow of other vehicles and pedestrians

If a motorized vehicle driver violates the provisions on the parking and temporary stopping of motorized vehicles of the law and regulations on road traffic safety, the driver is subject to a fine of ________ if the driver  is present at the scene but refuses to drive away, and his vehicle obstructs the flow of other vehicles and pedestrians
If a motorized vehicle on the road has no license plate, the traffic control department of the public security organ should ____________________.
question.B: Impose a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan
question.C: Impose a fine of more than 2,000 Yuan

question.Q: If a motorized vehicle running on the road fails to place a label of inspection, the traffic control department of the public security organ should _______________.
If a motorized vehicle running on the road fails to place the label of insurance, the traffic control department of the public security organ should _____________________.
If a motorized vehicle running on the road fails to bring the vehicle license with it, the traffic control department of the public security organ should __________________.
The motorized vehicle driver who has deliberately covered or stained the license plate is subject to _______ or a fine of 20 Yuan ~ 200 Yuan.
A motorized vehicle driver who has failed to install the license plate according to stipulations is subject to ____________ or a fine of 20 Yuan ~ 200 Yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered vehicle registration papers or has used the falsified or altered vehicle registration papers, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate these papers, ________ and impose a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered the license plate or has used the falsified or altered license plate, the traffic control department of the public security organ should _______, detain the vehicle and impose a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered the vehicle license or has used the falsified or altered vehicle license, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate the vehicle license, ___________ and impose a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered the label of inspection or has used the falsified or altered label of inspection, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate the label of inspection, ________ and impose a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered the label of insurance or has used the falsified or altered label of insurance, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate the label of insurance, ________ and impose a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has falsified or altered the driving license or has used the falsified or altered driving license, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate the driving license, ___________ and impose a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver uses the vehicle registration papers, license plate, vehicle license, label of inspection and label of insurance of other vehicles, the traffic control department of the public security organ should confiscate them, ________ and impose a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan.

If a motorized vehicle driver has illegally installed siren and marker light, the traffic control department of the public security organ should force him to remove them, confiscate them and impose a fine of ___________.
If a motorized vehicle driver who fails to obtain a driving license drives a motorized vehicle, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of ____________.

If a motorized vehicle driver drives a motorized vehicle when his driving license is temporarily detained, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of ____________.

If a motorized driver who fails to obtain a driving license drives a motorized vehicle, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also _____________.
question.A: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
question.D: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license

question.Q: If a motorized driver whose driving license has been revoked drives a motorized vehicle, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also __________.
question.B: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
question.C: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license

question.Q: If a motorized vehicle driver drives a motorized vehicle when his driving license is temporarily detained, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also ___________.
question.B: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license
question.C: Detain the driver for less than 15 days

question.Q: If a motorized vehicle driver allows his vehicle to be driven by a person who has not obtained a driving license, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of __________.

If a motorized vehicle driver allows his vehicle to be driven by a person whose driving license has been revoked or temporarily detained, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of _________.

If a motorized vehicle driver allows his vehicle to be driven by a person who has not obtained a driving license, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also _______________.
question.A: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
question.D: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license

question.Q: If a motorized vehicle driver allows his vehicle to be driven by a person whose driving license has been revoked or temporarily detained, the traffic control department of the public security department should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also ___________________.
question.A: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
question.B: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license

question.Q: If a motorized vehicle driver causes a traffic accident and runs away but his conduct does not constitute a crime, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of ____________________.

If a motorized vehicle driver causes a traffic accident and runs away but his conduct does not constitute a crime, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also ________________.
question.A: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
question.D: Ban the driver for five years from re-obtaining a driving license

question.Q: If a motorized vehicle runs _________ faster than the specified speed limit, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan.

If a motorized vehicle runs 50% faster than the specified speed limit, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine according to the stipulations and may also ________________.
question.A: Detain the driver for less than 15 days
question.D: Ban the driver for three years from re-obtaining a driving license

question.Q: If a motorized vehicle driver forces his way through in violation of the traffic control regulations and refuses to accept dissuasion, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of ____.

If a motor vehicle driver has deliberately destroyed, moved or altered traffic facilities and his conduct has caused serious consequences but does not constitute a crime, the traffic control department of the public security organ should impose a fine of ________.
If a driver drives an illegally assembled motorized vehicle on the road, the driver is subject to a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan and _______________.
question.B: The driving license should be revoked
question.C: The vehicle license should be revoked

question.Q: If a driver drives a motorized vehicle on the road, which has reached the write-off standard, the driver is subject to a fine of 200 Yuan ~ 2,000 Yuan and __________.
question.B: The vehicle license should be revoked
question.C: The driving license should be revoked
question.D: The driving license should be temporarily detained

question.Q: If a person sells a motorized vehicle that has reached the write-off standard, his illegal proceeds should be confiscated, a fine equivalent to the proceeds from selling the vehicle should be imposed, the vehicle should be confiscated, and ___________.
question.A: The vehicle purchaser should be detained
question.B: The vehicle seller should be detained
question.C: The driving license of the vehicle purchaser should be revoked
question.D: The vehicle should be arbitrarily written off

question.Q: If a party fails to perform the decision on administrative punishment, the administrative organ that has made the decision on administrative punishment may ______________.
question.A: Apply to the people’s court for enforcement
question.B: Apply to the people’s procuratorate for enforcement
question.C: Revoke the driving license of the party
question.D: Detain the party for less than 15 days

question.Q: The person who has violated the road traffic regulations should go to the ________ within 15 days to accept punishment.
question.C: Traffic control department of the public security organ
question.D: Department in charge of road transport administration

question.Q: If a person has violated the road traffic regulations and has failed to accept punishment without justification within a time limit, _________.
question.A: The person should be detained for 15 days
question.B: His driving license should be revoked
question.D: Be banned for lifetime from re-obtaining a driving license

question.Q: The Law of the People’s Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety is enacted to strengthen the administration over the motorized vehicles.
All vehicle drivers, pedestrians and passengers on the roads within the People’s Republic of China must abide by the Law of the People’s Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety.
All the units and individuals who are related to the road traffic activities within the People’s Republic of China must abide by the Law of the People’s Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety.
The pedestrians and passengers on the road should act in reference to the Law of the People’s Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety.
A motorized vehicle without a license plate may run on the road.
A motorized vehicle without a label of inspection may run on the road.
A motorized vehicle without a label of insurance may run on the road.
A person who drives a motorized vehicle on the road must bring the vehicle license with the vehicle.
The license plate of a motorized vehicle should be installed according to the stipulations, should be clear and complete and should not be covered or stained.
No unit or individual is allowed to confiscate or detain the license plate of a motorized vehicle.
If a motorized vehicle has reached the write-off standard, its revocation registration must be handled in a timely manner.
Siren or marker light may be installed on a motorized vehicle according to personal need.
No unit or individual is allowed to illegally assemble a motorized vehicle.
A professional repair enterprise may change the model number, engine number and the chassis number of a motorized vehicle.
A professional repair enterprise may change the vehicle identification code.
No unit or individual is allowed to falsify or alter the registration papers, license plate, vehicle license, label of inspection and label of insurance of a motorized vehicle.
If approved by a transport enterprise, the altered registration papers, license plate, vehicle license, label of inspection and label of insurance may of a motorized vehicle may be used.
A unit or individual may temporarily use the label of inspection and the label of insurance of another motorized vehicle on the road.
A transport enterprise may internally redistribute the labels of inspection and the labels of insurance of motorized vehicles on the road.

A motorized vehicle driver may drive a motorized vehicle on the road only after he has passed the tests administered by the traffic control department of the public security organ and obtained the driving license.

If a person who has a foreign driving license for motorized vehicle and has passed the tests administered by the traffic control department of the public security organ, a Chinese driving license for motorized vehicle may be issued to him.
Nobody is allowed to drive a motorized vehicle that has safety hazards such as incomplete safety devices or technically substandard components
A person who drinks alcohol but is not drunk may drive a motorized vehicle.
Uniformed road traffic signals are used nationwide.
Driving a motorized vehicle should observe the left-hand driving principle.

If a road is divided into the lane for motorized vehicles, the lane for non-motorized vehicles and the lane for pedestrians, the motorized vehicles, the non-motorized vehicles and the pedestrians should use the lanes designed respectively for them.
If a road has a special lane, other vehicles may use the special lane for overtaking.
A small motorized vehicle may overtake a police car performing an emergency task.
Motorized vehicles are not allowed to overtake at the intersections.
When a motorized vehicle passes a curve, it may overtake rapidly if no accident will occur.
otorized vehicles should pass the intersections according to the traffic signals.
When a road maintenance vehicle or an engineering vehicle is operating, other vehicles do not have to yield.
When a motorized vehicle temporarily stops on the road, it should not obstruct the flow of other vehicles and pedestrians.
A motorized vehicle whose designed maximum speed is less than 70km is allowed to enter the expressways.
When a motorized vehicle breaks down on the expressway, the persons on board should swiftly move to the front of the vehicle for hiding.
If a motorized vehicle breaks down or causes a traffic accident on the expressway and cannot to run normally, the vehicle should be towed by a rescue vehicle or a tow truck.
When a road accident causes human casualties and the vehicle driver needs to change the scene for rescuing the wounded, the driver should mark the location.
The punishments against the violations of the regulations on road traffic safety include warning, fine, temporary detention or revocation of the driving license, and detention.
driver may drive on the road an illegally assembled motorized vehicle or a motorized vehicle reaching the scrapped standard.

If a person who has violated the provisions of the law and regulations on road traffic safety and has caused a major traffic accident and if his act constitutes a crime, he should be held for criminal liabilities according to law and his driving license should be revoked by the traffic control department of the public security organ.

If a person has caused a traffic accident and run away, the traffic control department of the public security organ should revoke his driving license and ban him for lifetime from re-obtaining a driving license.

If a party fails to pay the fine within the time limit, the administrative organ that has made the decision on administrative punishment may impose an additional fine at the daily rate of 3% of the original fine.

The “roads” mentioned in the Law of the People’s Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety refer to the highways, urban roads and the places that are within the jurisdiction of the units but allow the passing of social motorized vehicles.
Squares, public parking lots and other places for public passing do not belong to the “roads” mentioned in the Law of the People’s Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety.

The “road accidents” mentioned in the Law of the People’s Republic of China on Road Traffic Safety refer to the incidents on the road that are caused by faults or accidents and have caused human casualties or property losses.
The registration of motorized vehicles excludes the registration of ________.

If the residence of the owner of a registered motorized vehicle moves out of the area under the jurisdiction of the traffic control department of the public security organ, the vehicle owner should apply to the traffic control department of the public security organ that has registered the vehicle for ___________ registration.

If the residence of the owner of a registered motorized vehicle moves into the area under the jurisdiction of the traffic control department of the public security organ, the vehicle owner should apply to the traffic control department of the public security organ that has registered the vehicle for __________ registration.

When applying for the transfer registration of a motorized vehicle, the certificate or document the party does not have to provide to the traffic control department of the public security organ that registers this vehicle is ______________.
question.D: The certificate and document on the transfer of the ownership of the vehicle

question.Q: f a registered motorized vehicle reaches the state’s mandatory write-off standard, the owner of the vehicle should ____________ before the expiration of the write-off period.
question.A: Sell it to the waste recycling station
question.B: Sell to the vehicle recycling enterprise
question.C: Hand it over to the traffic control department of the public security organ
question.D: Hand it over to the department in charge of road transport administration

question.Q: If a registered motorized vehicle reaches the state’s mandatory write-off standard, ______ should present the registration paper, license plate and vehicle license of the written-off vehicle to the traffic control department of the public security organ for revocation.
question.D: The safety and technical inspection institution

question.Q: If the registration paper, license plate and vehicle license of a motorized vehicle are lost or destroyed and the vehicle owner applies for reissuing them, the owner should provide his ID card and application materials to the _______________.
question.B: The traffic control department of the public security organ
question.C: The department in charge of industrial and commercial administration

question.Q: Painting and pasting signs or advertisements on the motorized vehicles should observe the principle that ____.
question.A: The painting and pasting can be done at will
question.B: The painting and pasting are mainly for artistic consideration
question.C: The painting and pasting should not affect safe driving
question.D: The painting and pasting should be done according to customer requests

question.Q: he small and mini non-commercial passenger vehicles should be inspected once every two years within __________ as from the date of registration.
The small and mini non-commercial passenger vehicles should be inspected once every ________ from the 6th to the 15th year as from the date of registration.
______ after a motorized vehicle driver obtains his driving license for the first time is his period of probation.
The motorized vehicle driver is not allowed to drive __________ during his period of probation.
The period of validity of a motorized vehicle driving license is respectively ____, 10 years and lifelong.
The cycle for recording the accumulated penalty points for violating road traffic safety regulations is ____.

If the accumulated penalty points of a motorized vehicle driver reach 12 points and the driver refuses to participate in the study course notified by the traffic control department of the public security organ and also refuses to take tests, the traffic control department of the public security organ _______________.
question.A: Should publicly announce that his driving license should no longer be used
question.D: Impose a double fine on him

question.Q: When a motor vehicle enters the lane for non-motorized vehicles, the maximum speed should be no more than
When a motor vehicle leaves the lane for non-motorized vehicles, the maximum speed should be no more than
When a motor vehicle passes a level crossing, the maximum speed should be no more than _____________.
When a motor vehicle passes sharp curve, the maximum speed should be no more than ________________.
When a motor vehicle passes a narrow road, the maximum speed should be no more than _________.
When vehicle passes a narrow bridge, the maximum speed should be no more than _______________.
When a motor vehicle goes down a slope, the maximum speed should be no more than __________.
When a motor vehicle makes a U turn, the maximum speed should be no more than _____________.
When a motor vehicle makes a turn, the maximum speed should be no more than _____________.
When a motor vehicle pulls a breakdown motorized vehicle, the maximum speed should be no more than ____.
When a motorized vehicle overtakes, it ______________.
question.A: Should overtake from the right side of the vehicle in front
question.B: Should overtake from the left side of the vehicle in front
question.C: May overtake from both sides of the vehicle in front
question.D: May not obey the speed limit

question.Q: When motorized vehicles cross each other on a narrow bridge, they should _________.
question.B: Reduce speed and pass on the right -hand side
question.C: Refuse to yield to the other side
question.D: Reduce speed and pass in the middle

question.Q: If there is an obstacle on one side of a road where two vehicles cross each other, ________ should go first.
question.A: The vehicle that has no obstacle in front
question.B: The vehicle that has no conditions to yield
question.C: The vehicle that has obstacle in front

question.Q: When motorized vehicles cross each other on a narrow slope, the correct method is to allow ___ to go first.
question.A: The vehicle going up the slope
question.B: The vehicle far from the top of the slope
question.C: The vehicle going down the slope
question.D: The vehicle going up the slope should go first, if the one going down the slope is halfway on the slope and the one to go up the slope has not begun going up the slope

question.Q: The place where a U turn is allowed for motorized vehicles is ____________.
At an intersection that has no directional traffic lights, _________________.
question.A: The motorized vehicle that will turn should yield to the vehicle that will go straight
question.B: The motorized vehicle that will go straight should yield to the vehicle that will turn
question.C: The motorized vehicle in the opposite direction that will turn left should yield to the Vehicle that will turn right
question.D: The vehicles should bypass from the left or right side and go through the intersection

question.Q: A motorized vehicle that goes through an intersection without the traffic lights should _______.
question.A: Yield to the vehicle coming from the left side of the road
question.B: Yield to the vehicle coming from the right side of the road
question.C: The vehicle that turns left should yield to the vehicle that turns right
question.D: The vehicle that goes straight should yield to the turning vehicle

question.Q: A motorized vehicle that encounters a traffic jam at the intersection in front should __________.
question.A: Stop outside the intersection and wait, instead of entering the intersection
question.B: Bypass from the left side and manage to go through the intersection
question.C: Bypass from the right side and manage to go through the intersection

question.Q: When a motorized vehicle turns left, the driver should ____________ in advance.

question.Q: When a motorized vehicle runs in a foggy weather, the driver should turn on the fog light and ______.

question.A: The head light, the contour light and the tail light

question.Q: When a motorized vehicle goes through an intersection that has no traffic lights, the driver should __________.
question.D: Use the high and low beam lights alternately to indicate the intention

question.Q: When using a soft connection to pull a vehicle, the distance between the puller and the pulled should be _____.

question.Q: A motorized vehicle is not allowed to stop __________ to an intersection.

question.Q: When there is no speed limit sign or marking, the maximum speed for motorized vehicles on an urban road without the central dividing line is ________.

question.Q: When a motorized vehicle breaks down on the road at night, obstructs the traffic flow and is difficult to move, the driver should turn on the hazard lights, place a warning sign ____________ behind the vehicle, and turn on the contour light and the tail light.

If the driver, owner or manager of a detained motorized vehicle fails to accept the punishment within 30 days and still fails to accept the punishment ____ after the public announcement by the traffic control department of the public security organ, the vehicle shall be sold by auction.
f the driving license of a motorized vehicle driver is lost, the driver can still drive a motorized vehicle.
The motorized vehicle driver is not allowed to drive a motorized vehicle when his driving license is detained.
If a road has fast and slow lanes, all motorized vehicles except motorcycles should drive in the fast lane.
When a motorized vehicle passes a sharp curve, the maximum speed should not exceed 30 kilometers per hour.
A motorized vehicle is not allowed to make a U turn at the place that has a sign prohibiting no left turn.
A motorized vehicle may make a U turn on a uphill road.
A motorized vehicle may reverse at an intersection.
A motorized vehicle is not allowed to reverse in a tunnel.
A motorized vehicle may choose to reverse on a one-way road.
A pulled motorized vehicle is not allowed to carry people except in the driving cab but is allowed to pull a trailer.
A vehicle with breaking failure can be pulled with a soft connection.
The width of the pulled motorized vehicle should not be larger than that of the pulling motorized vehicle.
Do not drive a vehicle when the door or compartment is not properly closed.
Do not hang or place articles close to the front and rear windows that block the vision of the driver.
People can test vehicles or learn to drive motorized vehicles on the expressway.
When a motorized vehicle runs on the expressway, it can overtake from the road shoulder.
The acceleration lane or the deceleration lane of the expressway allows the motorized vehicles to overtake.

f a registered motorized vehicle changes the engine, the owner of the vehicle should apply to the traffic control department of the public security organ that has registered the vehicle for registration alternation.

f a registered motorized vehicle changes the chassis, the owner of the vehicle should apply to the traffic control department of the public security organ that has registered the vehicle for registration alternation.

hen applying for the transfer registration of a motorized vehicle, the party should have the vehicle inspected by the traffic control department of the public security organ that has registered the vehicle.
hen a driver drives a motorized vehicle during the period of probation, the driver should paste or hang a uniform probation mark on the rear part of the vehicle.
he driver of a motorized vehicle may drive a police car, a fire engine, a wrecker or an ambulance during the period of probation.
he driver of a motorized vehicle may, during the period of probation, drive a vehicle carrying dangerous articles under the supervision and guidance of a regular driver.
f the penalty points of a motorized vehicle driver fail to reach 12 points in one scoring cycle and if the fines have all been paid, the points will be eliminated.
f the penalty points of a motorized vehicle driver fail to reach 12 points in one scoring cycle but the fines have not been paid up, the points will also be eliminated.
If a motorized vehicle driver has received 12 penalty points in one scoring cycle, the driver is not allowed to drive a motorized vehicle.
If a road has fast and slow lanes, all motorized vehicles should run in the slow lane and can enter the fast lane only when overtaking.
The motorized vehicle running in the fast lane should run at the prescribed speed for the fast lane, and should run in the slow lane if it fails to reach the prescribed speed for the fast lane.
When a motorized vehicle crosses a narrow road or a narrow bridge, the maximum speed should not exceed 30 kilometers per hour.
When a motorized vehicle crosses a level crossing, the maximum speed should not exceed 40 kilometers per hour.
When a motorized vehicle pulls a breakdown vehicle, the maximum speed should not be less than 30 kilometers per hour.
When a motorized vehicle crosses a non-motorized vehicle on a narrow road or a narrow bridge at night, the motorized vehicle should use the high beam light.
When a motorized vehicle reverses, it should do so after knowing the situation behind the vehicle and making sure it is safe to reverse.
At an intersection that has the guide lanes, the motorized vehicles should enter the guide lanes according to the directions they are headed for.
When passing through an intersection that has neither traffic lights nor traffic police, the Right-turning vehicles should yield to the left-turning vehicles coming in the opposite direction.
If a motorized vehicle has a breakdown or road accident, obstructs the traffic flow and is difficult to move, the vehicle should turn on the hazard lights.
If a motorized vehicle has a breakdown or road accident at night, obstructs the traffic flow and is difficult to move, all the vehicle should do is to turn on the hazard lights.
When a motorized vehicle crosses an overflowing road or bridge, the driver should stop and look at the situation, and passes through slowly before he makes sure that it is safe to do so.
The motorized vehicles should drive slowly and yield to the pedestrians in the compounds of the units or in the residential areas.
The motorized vehicles should drive according to the speed limits shown on the speed limit signs erected in the compounds of the units or in the residential areas.
Closing or opening the doors of a motorized vehicle should not obstruct the flow of other vehicles and pedestrians.
When a motorized vehicle is on the road, the people inside the vehicle are not allowed to stick their heads out of the window but may stretch their hands out of the window.

When a motorized vehicle reaches a ferry, it should obey the command of the ferry managers and wait in line at the designated place. When getting on or leaving the ferry boat, the vehicle should drive slowly.
When the speed indicated by the speed limit sign on the expressway contradicts with the speed indicated for the specific lanes, the speed indicated for the specific lanes should prevail.
When a motorized vehicle runs on the expressway, its minimum distance with the vehicle in front in the same lane should not be less 30 meters.

When a motorized vehicle runs on the expressway in rainy and other weather conditions with a visibility range of less than 50 meters, the speed of the vehicle should not exceed 40 kilometers per hour.

When a motorized vehicle runs on the expressway in snowy and other weather conditions with a visibility range of less than 50 meters, the speed of the vehicle should not exceed 30 kilometers per hour.

When a motorized vehicle runs on the expressway in sandy and other weather conditions with a visibility range of less than 50 meters, the speed of the vehicle should not exceed 50 kilometers per hour.
When running on the expressway, the motorized vehicles are not allowed to reverse, drive in the opposite direction, make a U turn by crossing the central divider, or stop in the carriageways.
When running on the expressway, the motorized vehicles may drive or stop in the emergency lane in non-emergency cases.
When running on the expressway, the motorized vehicles are not allowed to ride and roll on the lane-dividing line or in the shoulder.
If a motorized vehicle causes a road accident and the party runs away, the party is not held liable for the accident.
If the party files a civil action with the people’s court during the mediation by the traffic control department of the public security organ, the mediation terminates.
The party has the Right to make presentation and defense against the punishments meted out by the traffic control department of the public security organ or the traffic police.
The traffic police may ignore the presentation and defense made by the party and may even increase the punishment against the party.

On a road that has no central divider or central line, the motorized vehicle that has a vehicle coming in the opposite direction should reduce speed, drive on the Right side of the road and keep a safe distance with other vehicles and pedestrians.

When a motorized vehicle runs on the expressway in foggy and other weather conditions with a visibility range of less than 50 meters, the vehicle should not drive at a speed of more than 20 kilometers per hour and should leave the expressway from the nearest exit as soon as possible.

When a motorized vehicle runs on the expressway in hailing and other weather conditions with a visibility range of less than 50 meters, the vehicle should not drive at a speed of more than 20 kilometers per hour and should leave the expressway from the nearest exit as soon as possible.

question.Q: When driving on a road, the driver should control the speed according to _____ and drive safely within the specified scope.

qualified driver should not only be technically adept, but more importantly have good driving habits and ethical attainments.

Driving and smoking has no harm on safe driving.
